video.title: Gary: Tank Commander
video.synopsis: A soldier on leave from a tour of duty in Iraq offers unique insights and a comic look into life on the home front and the front lines.

episodes.synopsis: Gary returns from Iraq to a hero's welcome, but is soon tasked with recruitment duty at a shopping mall with a sergeant who enlists an inept recruit.
episodes.title: Be the Best

episodes.synopsis: When the fire brigade goes on strike, Gary swaps his tank for a Green Goddess fire engine, but he and Jacko prove to be an embarrassment to the squad.
episodes.title: Green Gods

episodes.synopsis: When Gary is sent to collect an arriving American general and help with his mission, he learns the man's real plan is to find his Scottish ancestors.
episodes.title: The General

episodes.synopsis: When Gary is chosen to represent the army in a debate against a student, he is told just what to say, but finds his opponent has been underestimated.
episodes.title: The Great Debate

episodes.synopsis: A routine training exercise goes awry when Gary agrees to collect a cooker for his dad -- an errand he promises his crew will only take "two minutes."
episodes.title: In the Field

episodes.synopsis: Gary tries to enjoy his birthday, despite being stuck on guard duty with Charlie, and inadvertently ignites a rumor that Charlie is leaving the army.
episodes.title: Stagging On

episodes.synopsis: Gary, Jacko, Charlie and Adam miss their flight home from Afghanistan. Faced with a 12-hour wait, Gary tries to bribe his way onto an earlier flight.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: During a tank transport, Gary and the gang defy orders by stopping to eat, setting off a chain of events requiring Gary to ask for a series of favors.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Punished with kitchen duty on the night of an important dinner, Gary and his friends must make sure the event is a success despite a drunken visitor.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When Gary and his family gather to scatter his late mother's ashes, he finds himself distracted by strange phone calls that land him in hot water.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Outside a climate conference, Gary and his pals are tasked with rounding up a group of protesters, whose costumes have an effect on him.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Dreaming of stardom, Gary and his pals audition for an army recruitment ad campaign, but tensions during rehearsals force Gary to act as peacemaker.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: To save face after being humiliated by a fitness trainer, Gary challenges him to a race, placing a demotion on the table if he loses.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: After impressing the captain during a training exercise, Gary is offered a job that sounds too good to be true, which is exactly the case.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Gary's old nemesis is posted to the barracks, and past rivalries are soon restored. After being set up, Gary must prove his innocence to save his job.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Tasked with the duty of showing a visiting MP around, Gary and Mickey decide to ignore strict instructions and instead liven up the agenda.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: In the last week of an uneventful posting in Germany, things liven up when one of Gary's friends announces his engagement to a local woman.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: A fortune-teller's ominous prediction makes Gary reluctant to attend the barracks' Halloween bash, where he must face whether the prophecy comes true.
episodes.title: Episode 6
